txt.en: 'Whether it is armour for the guards, sea-farers, or anyone else who makes a request of the metalsmith's guild, we fill their orders. Demand increased with the rise of the Kindred and remains as high as ever.\n\n'As a member of our guild, we request your assistance in keeping our reputation as pure as the ore we use to craft our wares.'
The metalsmith's guild in Umbar Baharbêl supplies armour and tools to the populace. You are tasked with assisting in meeting the demand.
Craft a crate of shields for the Umbar Metalsmith's Guild
Deliver a crate of shields to the Umbar Metalsmith's Guild Leader
Crafted a crate of shields for the Umbar Metalsmith's Guild
Provide the crate of shields to the Umbar Metalsmith's Guild Leader.
'Most excellent. We will send these shields out to owners with great haste.'
The recipe needed to complete this quest is available for purchase. <rgb=#00f000>Purchase the quest recipe from the guild leader.</rgb>\n\nPack a crate of shields for Umbar Baharbêl.
